attributes.title: STOLE PICTURES FROM CAMERA ROLL

EVEN THOUGH THEY WERE QUITE SEXY, IT DOESNT TAKE AWAY FROM THE FACT THAT I WAS VIOLATED. I BLAME THIS APP. DONT DOWNLOAD!!! THIS APP SHOULD BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE AND BANNED!!! ITS STEALING ALL OF YOUR INFORMATION INCLUDING YOUR NUDE PHOTOGRAPHY OF YOURSELF AND QUITE POSSIBLY YOUR PARTNERS!!
